name: Pianist - Piano King
description:
"Pianist - Piano King" is a virtual piano for learning to play and enjoy the piano. And it's a piano game for you to play with your friends and challenge with the world's players every day.

Main Feature:
Rich Piano Tracks
* There are 146 piano music, including nursery rhymes, Christmas songs, classical.
* Level unlocked songs and instruments
* Add to My Favourite
* Quickly to play by searching
* Upgrade to VIP unlock all the songs and without ad.

Daily Challenge
* Challenge a song with the world's players every day.
* If you are in the top 10 of the leaderboard, you will receive coins.


Piano Battle
* Consuming 20 coins every player every game, who win will get all the coins.
* Chatting with the players

Free Piano
* A purely virtual piano for you playing freely.
* Single Mode, Double Bond Pattern, Versus Mode
* Recording your work

Instruments
* In addition to the piano, it will sound other instruments, such as Celesta, Glockenspiel, Accordian, Harmonica, Guitar, Timpani, Trumpet, and so on.
